data.fullContent: Public relations is the process of promoting or marketing goods and services to the general public. It's an ever-changing and highly specialized field, requiring knowledge of many different skills, including marketing techniques, social media platforms, and public speaking. Public relations is centered on the interactions between an organization and its public. Organizations create products and services, which directly affect the public, but a large part of their success depends on their ability to meet the expectations of the publics. Public relations is particularly important in modern businesses since people today are often using social media to give feedback on products and services.
